post:
We would like to wish you and your family a Merry Christmas & a Happy New Year 2016!

To celebrate this festive season and the launch of our WordPress Cloud VPS hosting service, we are offering a 50% discount across our WordPress hosting plans (WordPress Starter & WordPress Pro) for a limited time only!

WordPress Starter

  • Plesk Web Pro (30 Domains)
  • 1 vCPU / 2 GB RAM / 60 GB Storage
  • 1 IP Address
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 50 Mbps Shared Network Bandwidth

One-time Setup Fee: S$50 (Waived!)
Monthly Fee: S$110/month
NOW ONLY @ S$55/month!

----------------------------------------------------------

WordPress Pro

  • Plesk Web Host (Unlimited Domains)
  • 2 vCPUs / 4 GB RAM / 80 GB Storage
  • 1 IP Address
  • Unmetered Bandwidth
  • 50 Mbps Shared Network Bandwidth

One-time Setup Fee: S$50 (Waived!)
Monthly Fee: S$155/month
NOW ONLY @ S$77.50/month!

To sign up, please click here and enter promotional code: sg-xmas-wordpress to enjoy this special offer. Kindly note this promotion will be valid only till 31st December 2015.
